attributes.action: Refrain from the granting of a Knighthood to David Beckham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The granting of these honours should be preserved for those whom have contributed greatly to the UK as a whole, and not merely as a publicity measure. They should not be a signal to others that mediocrity is rewarded, and believe the granting of this to David Beckham would be entirely divisive within the UK

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
